name: questengine

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run start:react" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.build: react-app-rewired build; npm run fix-html-paths; npm run build:electron
scripts.build:electron: tsc main.ts preload.ts src/infrastructure/integration/QuestEngineService.ts --outDir build --target es2020 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop
scripts.fix-html-paths: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const html=fs.readFileSync('build/index.html','utf8').replace(/\/static\//g,'./static/'); fs.writeFileSync('build/index.html',html); console.log('Fixed HTML paths for Electron');"

author: CansyLand
description: Quest Engine - A visual quest builder and game engine
